# gs_local_dir


Alias to gs_data_dir_local() function




## Description

This function is deprecated, please use `gs_data_dir_local()` instead.





## Usage
```r
gs_local_dir(url, local_dir = "gs", echo = FALSE)
```




## Arguments


Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
url | Google Storage bucket URL (e.g. ``gs://<your-bucket>``).
local_dir | Local directory to synchonize Google Storage bucket(s) to.
echo | Echo command output to console.







## See Also

`gs_data_dir_local()`
